title: 7-Day Tour of Lima, Machu Picchu, Rainbow Mountain and Cusco
description:
This exciting 7-day itinerary will take you through some of the most impressive destinations in Peru. You will begin your trip in Lima, where you can explore the vibrant capital and discover its historical and cultural attractions.
Then, you will head towards Paracas, a beautiful seaside resort on the southern coast of Peru. You will take a boat ride to the Ballestas Islands, where you will be able to observe an impressive variety of birds and sea lions in their natural habitat.
After Paracas, you will head towards Ica, where you will experience the excitement of Huacachina. You will experience a buggy ride through the impressive sand dunes and practice sandboarding, sliding down the high dunes. You will also have the opportunity to visit a local winery in Ica and enjoy wine and pisco tastings.
The next destination on your itinerary is Machu Picchu, the jewel of the Inca empire. Explore the impressive Mountain of 7 Colors.

Disaster

This tour was a painful mess for me. It's not a private tour and the entire itinerary is subpar and seems to have been designed for backpacking kids. Everything was very low quality. I had to constantly work behind the scenes and pay other people and businesses to upgrade my activities so that it wasn't a disaster. I eventually just abandoned the tour and proceeded on my own. This tour and company book the lowest quality accommodations and services. Steer clear. The agent tried to assist me via text but she could only do so much because the company owner was not active and could not be contacted.
